knowRights.title: Know Your Rights
knowRights.subtitle: Understanding your constitutional rights is the first step to protecting yourself.
knowRights.rightToRemainSilentDesc: You don't have to answer questions without a lawyer present
knowRights.rightToAttorneyDesc: You have the right to legal representation, even if you can't afford it
knowRights.rightToFairTrialDesc: You're entitled to due process and an impartial jury
knowRights.searchWarrantRightsDesc: Police need a warrant to search you or your property in most cases
knowRights.selfIncriminationDesc: You cannot be forced to testify against yourself
knowRights.speedyTrialDesc: You have the right to a trial without unreasonable delays
